Translations.Text: By those lined up in ranks
and those who warn, crying warnings
and those who recite God's word
your God is One
Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything between them, Lord of every sunrise
We have adorned the nearest heaven with planets
and protected them against every rebellious devil
[so that the devils] may not listen to the highest assembly [of angels] but be repelled from every side
driven away. For them there is a continuous punishment
except for him who snatches a glimpse [of such knowledge], He will be pursued by a piercing flame
Then ask those who persist on denying the truth if they were more difficult to create than those other beings We have created, for We created them from sticky clay
No wonder you are surprised, to see them ridicule [the message]
and when they are reminded [of the Truth], they don't want to remember
and when they see a sign, they ridicule it
saying, "This is mere magic
When We have died and become dust and bones, are we to be resurrected
and our forefathers too
Say, "Yes, and [on that Day of Judgment] you will be humiliated
[On that Day,] there will be only a single shout, and at once they will begin to see
They will say, "How terrible for us! This is the Day of Judgment
and [They will be told], "This is the Day of separation [between the good and the bad], which you used to deny
